mapper.select: select approval_id, approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2 from supplymarketing.gt_approval where approval_id = #{approvalId}

select approval_id, approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2 from supplymarketing.gt_approval limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into supplymarketing.gt_approval(approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2) values (#{approvalUserId}, #{approvalUserName}, #{approvalTime}, #{approvalStatus}, #{approvalComment}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark1}, #{remark2})
mapper.update:
update supplymarketing.gt_approval
approval_user_id = #{approvalUserId},
approval_user_name = #{approvalUserName},
approval_time = #{approvalTime},
approval_status = #{approvalStatus},
approval_comment = #{approvalComment},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark_1 = #{remark1},
remark_2 = #{remark2},
where approval_id = #{approvalId}
